root.name: Dancing Furby
root.description: OverviewDancing Furby is a rhythm game developed by TOSE Co. and published by Tomy for the Game Boy Color platform. Dancing Furby was never released outside of Japan.Link-UpDancing Furby has an option when a section of a song has been beaten to send the piece to a real Furby toy to teach it. Eventually the Furby will learn entire songs, and can sing them back.
